author: kpedro88
body: Addresses issue reported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-git-tools/pull/125#issuecomment-1912020011 / https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43592#issuecomment-1911840635. Proof that it works as expected now: https://github.com/kpedro88/cmssw/commit/aac6c7dd3157573fe88ae2d18d871078fef39f66
title: fix newline in git log format
